title: why is everyone dropping?
body:
plat v to gold 4 (7 wins)
silver1 to b1 (6 wins)
gold 2 to s1 (5 wins)
gold v to s2 (9 wins)

??

also, do pre season games matter at all?

replies.body:
Preseason games do matter, but not significantly alter your MMR.
 The soft reset means that your MMR is 1-2 divisions below where you ended and then the MMR adjusts from there.
